snippet: As part of the shutdown, multiple government agencies from N.A.S.A. to the U.S. Department of Transportation to the National Archives posted messages on their Web sites and social media channels, including Twitter and Facebook, to note they would not...
abstract: As part of the shutdown, multiple government agencies from N.A.S.A. to the U.S. Department of Transportation to the National Archives posted messages on their Web sites and social media channels, including Twitter and Facebook, to note they would not be providing regular updates during the shutdown.

headline.main: Shutdown Leads Many Agencies to Go Dark on Social Media
